programme.title: World Club Series Rugby League Highlights
programme.sub-title: Leeds Rhinos v North Queensland Cowboys.
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos v North Queensland Cowboys. Action from the World Club Challenge at Headingley, as the Super League champions and NRL winners went head to head in the final match of the series. The Rhinos completed the historic treble of Challenge Cup, League Leaders' Shield and Super League title last season, but began this campaign without three of their most experienced players. Jamie Peacock and Kylie Leuluai have both now retired, while captain Kevin Sinfield has jumped codes to join Yorkshire Carnegie in rugby union. Brian McDermott's side also made a less-than-ideal start to the defence of their Super League crown, losing their opening game against Warrington Wolves 12-10 on this ground.(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Lee McKenzie introduces coverage of the Japanese Grand Prix from the Suzuka circuit. McLaren's Lewis Hamilton is a previous winner, although his victory came at the Fuji Speedway circuit in 2007. Last year he managed a third-place finish here, but it was Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel who took the honours ahead of Jarno Trulli. With Ferrari's Fernando Alonso another previous winner at this famously-demanding circuit, expect the competition to be fierce as the season nears its climax(n)

programme.title: Fiorentina - Lazio (diretta)
programme.desc: Serie A. 36a giornata. Viola con una sola vittoria (5-4 sull'Inter) nelle ultime 5 giornate, per il resto 2 pareggi e 2 sconfitte. La Fiorentina ha perso 5 delle ultime 6 sfide di campionato al Franchi contro i biancocelesti. La Lazio, con la terza vittoria consecutiva (7 a 3 sulla Sampdoria), ha conquistato aritmeticamente l'Europa League. Commento: Trevisani-Ambrosini(n)

programme.title: Atalanta - Milan (diretta)
programme.desc: Serie A. 36a giornata. Ai bergamaschi manca un punto per ritornare in Europa dopo 27 anni. Il Milan, dopo la sconfitta con la Roma (1-4), deve invece vincere per continuare a sperare. I rossoneri non battono i bergamaschi in campionato da 2 anni (1-2), poi hanno ottenuto 2 pareggi e 1 sconfitta fra casa e fuori. Commento: Caressa-Bergomi(n)
